title: Feature Request - Persistent Notification
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Sometimes I think it's better to have persistent notification like other messaging works, or like in windows. So I think, and hope, if it's possible, please make notification can be persistent on Teams for Linux.

I do know there is number of notiification on teams icon on task bar, just... we need to history of chat notification on gdbus or such... it will be very very useful... :')

**Describe the solution you'd like**
An option that can enable persistent notification, or at least longer dismisable notification

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
I tried using MS teams on way droid, and using GSConnect/KDEConnect, and having persistent notification, but it's a hazzle, as I now have 2 application running at same time

**Additional context**
- Related configuration https://stackoverflow.com/a/36868084,  and related project https://github.com/nativefier/nativefier

I haven't tried to override the notification yet using user script on Browser, but I think I will try that....
